title: Looking for a font used by Mondadori(Verona) 1942
content:
Good morning,

this is the first time I post in this forum. Could anyone help me to find this font? The book was published by Mondadori 1942 in Verona (Italy). It would be very helpful for me if anyone could find this font,

thanks a lot in advance,

Martin

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101231110212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Collodi_4209.jpg)
